org.apache.flink.core.fs

类 Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.fs.Path
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, IOReadableWritable

    @Public
public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOReadableWritable, java.io.Serializable
    Names a file or directory in a FileSystem. Path strings use slash as the directory separator. A path string is absolute if it begins with a slash.

    Tailing slashes are removed from the path.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      private java.net.URI uri
      The internal representation of the path, a hierarchical URI.

        public Path(java.lang.String pathString)

        参数:
        pathString - the string to construct a path from

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkAndTrimPathArg

        private java.lang.String checkAndTrimPathArg(java.lang.String path)
        Checks if the provided path string is either null or has zero length and throws a IllegalArgumentException if any of the two conditions apply. In addition, leading and tailing whitespaces are removed.
        参数:
        path - the path string to be checked
        返回:
        The checked and trimmed path.

      • initialize

        private void initialize(java.lang.String scheme,
                        java.lang.String authority,
                        java.lang.String path)
        Initializes a path object given the scheme, authority and path string.
        参数:
        scheme - the scheme string.
        authority - the authority string.
        path - the path string.

        返回:

        public boolean hasWindowsDrive()
        Checks if the provided path string contains a windows drive letter.
        返回:
        True, if the path string contains a windows drive letter, false otherwise.

      • hasWindowsDrive

        private boolean hasWindowsDrive(java.lang.String path,
                                boolean slashed)
        Checks if the provided path string contains a windows drive letter.
        参数:
        path - the path to check
        slashed - true to indicate the first character of the string is a slash, false otherwise
        返回:
        true if the path string contains a windows drive letter, false otherwise
